sect2.title: Final configuration
sect2.para: In order for the system to find some files, run the following commands, as the root user:

screen.userinput:
ln -svfn /opt/lxqt/share/lxqt /usr/share/lxqt &&
for i in /opt/lxqt/share/applications/* do ln -svf $i /usr/share/applications/ done unset i
